name: Alessandro Galbarini
subtitle: Group CFO presso Brugola OEB Industriale S.p.A.
about: My progressive background within auditing and consulting department in one of Big Four provides marketable strengths in key Accounting, Finance and Auditing areas.As Auditor Senior Manager of a number of engagements and results-oriented problem solver, I have maintained a consistent track record for high achievements and profitability by meeting project goals, project dates and customer needs/objectives. My professional experience has developed through various customers, leaders in their own industry, such as Health Care (3 years as manager responsible), Chemicals & Pharmaceutical, Automotive and Energy, including some experience in the Transaction Services and Forensic departments. The Audit engagements were respectively performed in compliance with ISA or PCAOB and Italian GAAP, IFRS and US-GAAP (including SoX experience). From February 2009 to December 2011, worked as Financial Controller in a multinational industrial company located in Italy (near Pavia). This experience increases my knowledge in relation to budget/forecast preparation, analysis of monthly variances, analysis of production costs by products driving also market strategy. From February 2012, I start a new engagement as Responsible of Controlling Department (role not present in the Company) of an Italian production Company with site also abroad (Spain, China, Netherlands & Argentina) growing from Nov'12 as Group Finance Mgr.  Based on my experience and attitude to work by project I’m interesting also to engage as Temporary Management.Specialties: Updating course on Italian and International accounting principles (IFRS & US-GAAP).Informatics Knowledge: strong skilled in using Word, Excel, Power point, Dynamics AX (Microsoft ERP) and Internetknowledge of SAP, Mac and Access
experiences:
Italian Family Company producer of fasteners for automotive sector (worldwide leader of the 7 critical fasteners for engine and patent of the Brugola fastener).

MTA – Electronic and electromechanical components for the Automotive Industry

MTA is a leading company in the design and production of electronic and electromechanical components for automotive, off-highway and motorcycles. Founded in 1954, MTA has now 2 production units in Italy and 8 foreign sites.

•	Italian Company of AFGlobal Group (based in Houston - USA) and made up as holding of Special Flanges SpA (Italy Company producer of flanges, disks and rings) and to centralize the managing of Finance department of the European subsidiaries.
•	As Group Financial Controller at European level, I have a strong focus on administrative and controlling department improvement of Special Flanges, managing of the European Companies through common financial-administrative-fiscal strategy.

•	Responsible for Human Resource, Legal Affairs and IT of Special Flanges SpA.

posts.post: Su Il Sole 24 Ore la notizia della riacquisizione del 100% della proprietà della nostra azienda da parte della famiglia Brugola.Un traguardo raggiunto grazie alla determinazione del Presidente jody brugola e di tutte le persone che hanno contribuito a questo importante risultato.Nell’articolo, anche il nostro sguardo al futuro e l’ambizioso obiettivo fissato per quest’anno: continuare a crescere, superando i 200 milioni di fatturato.Leggi l’articolo: https://ow.ly/mQM150RjOmUhashtag#Brugola hashtag#BrugolaOEB

Made in Italy, sostenibilità, traguardi raggiunti nel 2023, nuovi progetti: sono tanti i temi affrontati dal nostro Presidente, jody brugola, nella lunga intervista rilasciata al quotidiano Il Giorno in edicola oggi.Il 2023 ha visto grandi investimenti, ampliamenti degli spazi produttivi e un preaccordo strategico sull’assetto azionario. Basi fondamentali per affrontare l’anno in corso con nuove sfide.Leggi l’articolo completo: https://ow.ly/7uSQ50Qwa52hashtag#Brugola hashtag#BrugolaOEB hashtag#Viti hashtag#Automotive

Nella giornata di oggi, Brugola ha siglato un pre-accordo con i due soci di minoranza Gruppo Fontana e Gruppo Agrati per il riacquisto della loro partecipazione, riportando così il 100% dell’azienda Brugola OEB Industriale alla famiglia Brugola.L'accordo prevede che nella primavera del 2024 si concluderà il passaggio di proprietà delle partecipazioni societarie._Today, Brugola has signed a preliminary agreement with the two minority partners, Gruppo Fontana and Gruppo Agrati, for the repurchase of their shares, thereby returning 100% ownership of Brugola OEB Industriale to the Brugola family.The agreement stipulates that the transfer of ownership of the company shares will be completed in the spring of 2024.hashtag#Brugola hashtag#BrugolaOEB

Brugola OEB Industriale S.p.A. sceglie Malgara X - Efficiency & Sustainability, grazie all’accordo siglato con Mattia Malgara, per la gestione dell’efficienza energetica nei propri stabilimenti.200 tonnellate di CO₂ all'anno: questa è la quantità di anidride carbonica che Brugola OEB Industriale S.p.A. prevede di non immettere nell'atmosfera grazie alla riduzione del consumo di energia elettrica, resa possibile dall'intervento di Malgara X.hashtag#risparmioenergetico hashtag#bilanciodisostenibilità hashtag#carbonneutral hashtag#carbonneutrality hashtag#esg hashtag#co2reduction
